Reviews.Title: Avoid this camera
Reviews.Author: Tama Para
Reviews.Content: I usually don't give bad reviews, but this cheap camera isn't worth any price. More of a toy than an actual digital camera, and not even nice enough to resell in a garage sale. The camera feels cheap, it doesn't have flash, (which maybe I should have noticed prior to purchase) so you can't take pix in low lighting. The camera doesn't signal to the user that a picture has been snapped, though the owner's manual says it will beep, ours never did or it was so inaudible we couldn't hear it. There isn't even a satisfying click or noise or anything, so maybe we bought a defective model. The photo's are grainy - I am very dissatisfied with the purchase of this camera. Save your money. (Ours was bought on a weekend getaway since we forgot our real camera. Should have bought a disposable over this.)

ProductInfo.Name: Digital Concepts 98377 Digital Camera - Digital camera - compact - 0.3 Mpix - red
